text: The Saints placed running back Reggie Bush on injured reserve ending his season. The decision was made after Bush met with Dr. James Andrews this past week. Bush injured his left knee on Oct. 19 and had arthroscopic surgery to fix a torn meniscus and missed four games. He was bothered by the knee last week against the Bears and did n't play in the second half. Pierre Thomas will get most of the carries and is an excellent play against the Lions this week.
title: Bush placed on injured reserve.
